item.title: Rubbish flytipping, 24th July
item.description:
From Grove Park all the way along Downham Way there is dumped mattresses pallets a pile of garden tools etc Itâ€™s disgusting his nothing g is being done about this. People just feel they can dump their rubbish anywhere!

item.title: Large tree branch on grass, 24th July
item.description:
